comments.body: Can you please remove above three lines in all build scripts? They are only needed for core packages (and those are all packaged now).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +3,7 @@# R refuses to build packages that mark themselves as Priority: Recommended
mv DESCRIPTION DESCRIPTION.old
grep -v '^Priority: ' DESCRIPTION.old > DESCRIPTION

$R CMD INSTALL --build .
